# leftShoulder

**Instance Property**

The left shoulder button element.

## Declaration

```swift
var leftShoulder: GCControllerButtonInput { get }
```

## Discussion

The shoulder buttons in the gamepad profile are analog buttons.

## Reading Shoulder Button Inputs

- **rightShoulder**: The right shoulder button element.
